Author: jl777c#5810
Content: DTO is a building block, it provides a consensus pricefeed

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: out of N of those, you can create a synthetic price

Author: Flint#6435
Content: ok - thanks

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: "KMD_BTC,BTC_USD,XAU_USD,**/,1"

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: that combines the three DTO pricefeeds  KMD_BTC, BTC_USD and XAU_USD into XAU/KMD synthetic price

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: and the peg is to that synthetic price, backed by the value of the KMD deposited to back the issuing of the stablecoin

Author: Flint#6435
Content: clearly you show an example of creating and binding and then it’s up to the investigators of the instruction

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: yes, change the XAU_USD in the above into XYZ_USD price and you have a synthetic price of XYZ in terms of KMD, which can then be used for the pegged and backed chain

Author: Flint#6435
Content: Yes, in this case, demand will increase without any taxes

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: as long as there are use cases for these pegged chains, yes, KMD demand will be proportional to the amount that wants to be transmuted to different form
